{{cpp/ranges/zip_view/title|''sentinel''}}
{{cpp/ranges/zip_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|notes={{mark expos}}|
template&lt; bool Const &gt;
class /*sentinel*/;
}}

The return type of {{rlpt|end|zip_view::end}} when the underlying view is not a {{lconcept|common_range}}.

The type {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;true&gt;}} or {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;false&gt;}} treats the underlying view as const-qualified or non-const-qualified respectively.
